definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
a while/a spell/a short time/a burst

sentences.english: For starters, it's being held in the gymnasium at Valley High School, a few miles from the Strip.
sentences.chinese: 訓練在山谷高中已經有一陣子，距離繁華區有幾英里。

sentences.english: He is down with a nasty bout of flu.
sentences.chinese: 他患了一陣子感冒，很難受。

sentences.english: I always play mahjong at Guo's house.
sentences.chinese: 這陣子我老是去老郭家打牌。

sentences.english: Live in Northern California once, but leave before it makes you soft.
sentences.chinese: 去北加州住一陣子，但在心神松懶前搬走。

sentences.english: I have more time to think these days, Jeff…I'm proud of you.
sentences.chinese: 這陣子我有更多的時間想些事情，傑夫，我爲你自豪。

sentences.english: We had some fun and games a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月前我們大玩了一陣子。

sentences.english: There was a few minutes that the aircraft was down down and feeling like free-fall.
sentences.chinese: 有一陣子一直往下掉，感覺就像自由落體一樣。

sentences.english: In fact, Jason was short of money at that moment.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，那陣子詹森也正缺錢呢。

sentences.english: When it comes to reproduction, men will still have it easier for some time.
sentences.chinese: 談起繁衍來，男人還能優哉遊哉一陣子。

sentences.english: Jo and Sam decided to try living apart for a while.
sentences.chinese: 喬與薩姆決定試着分開住一陣子。

sentences.english: That could be for a while for any reasons.
sentences.chinese: 可能因爲各種原因要等一陣子。

sentences.english: They even gave us a set amount because he couldn't work for a while.
sentences.chinese: 由於他那陣子無法工作，他們還給了我們一筆錢。

sentences.english: For a while, making baby ah to squeeze out a few words in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 好一陣子，嘴裏咿咿呀呀地擠出幾個字。

sentences.english: The candle sputtered for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 蠟燭劈劈啪啪響了一陣子。

sentences.english: The ship drifted helplessly for a time.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船孤零無依地漂泊了一陣子。

sentences.english: I haven't gotten any more squid on deck recently.
sentences.chinese: 順便報告一下，魷魚已經有陣子沒來拜訪我了。
